snippet: The foundation of Richard Mourdock's victory over Indiana's longtime senator, Richard G. Lugar, was built in large part on his campaign as Indiana state treasurer to halt the Obama administration's bailout of Chrysler in 2009.
abstract: The foundation of Richard Mourdock's victory over Indiana's longtime senator, Richard G. Lugar, was built in large part on his campaign as Indiana state treasurer to halt the Obama administration's bailout of Chrysler in 2009.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Before Primary Win, Mourdock Sought to Block Chrysler's Bailout
